# MKAnnotationView.DragState.dragging

**Case**

An annotation view is actively dragging.

## Declaration

```swift
case dragging
```

## Discussion

The view is in the middle of a drag operation and is tracking progress.

## Constants

- **MKAnnotationView.DragState.none**: An annotation view that doesn’t have a drag operation.
- **MKAnnotationView.DragState.starting**: An annotation view begins dragging.
- **MKAnnotationView.DragState.canceling**: An annotation view cancels drag operation.
- **MKAnnotationView.DragState.ending**: An annotation view ends dragging.
